text_block_list.text:
The Selection Race. It's known as the scene of 
many a horsegirl and trainer pair's first meeting.

With said race drawing near, I made my way to the shrine 
with the intent of asking the gods to let me meet a wonderful 
partner there as well…
Huooooooooh!!!! That glint on your suit's lapel! Most undeniably, it is a badge! Veritable proof of trainerhood!!
You must be the one foretold to me! My soul-bound trainer!!
Huwawah!? I can assure you I am no such entity! You will find no dubious horsegirls present!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Excuse my late introduction, my name is Matikanefukukitaru!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Upon this ground I have stood, awaiting eagerly the arrival 
of my predestined one. I am so glad to meet you at last!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I am talking about you, of course, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to rewind the clock a few hours… Divine Shiraoki 
foretold, and I abided, relocating myself to this very location. 
It was then that I drew a fortune slip.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Lightning ran through my body the very next moment! 
For written on it were the words: "You will meet your soulmate"!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Who should subsequently appear but a trainer…! 
You could be none other than my predestined one!
choice_data_list: Sorry, you have the wrong person.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah～! Please hold a moment! I am certain it cannot be so!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Do you truly believe that a trainer appearing before a horsegirl 
awaiting someone is anything but the machinations of fate?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
In other words, our meeting was inevitable! 
Divine Shiraoki's guidance is never mistaken!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Let us go, Trainer! Let us chase fortune 
in the Twinkle Series together!

I'm gonna get dragged into being her trainer 
if I don't speak my mind.
choice_data_list:
That would be irresponsible of me when 
I don't know anything about you.

That would be irresponsible of me when 
I don't know anything about you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Rationality descendeth!? Your judgement is sage indeed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Point taken! In that case, the perfect opportunity to show 
you my merits has already presented itself!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The Selection Race will take place soon, so I will 
show to you my true strength there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I will have you pick me up for training! Juuust you be there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
With that set, I must begin preparing for it immediately! 
Full speed… in the direction of fortuuune!

Those were, for now, the last words I heard 
out of this Matikanefukukitaru girl's mouth 
before she darted off into the distance.

The day after, I came to check on the horsegirls 
busily training for the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Suzuka! Let's put our backs into it!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Uhm… into what, exactly? 
You dragged me out here without explanation…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Today's carrot reading said running against a partner would bring luck! Hence, I request your assistance!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Well, I guess that's fine……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Wohooh～! Thank you kindly～! I shall hand you a charm to let your chopsticks always split perfectly later!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty then, in accordance with the lucky number thirty-nine, 
let us run thirty-nine laps on the turf course!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ehh…!? You do realize one lap is close to 2 km? Thirty-nine laps would come down to more than 60 km…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Pay it no mind! A lucky number would never steer us wrong!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hey now…… A-Are we really…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Gheeh… heeeh… It… It was a bridge too far……

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Whahh… haah… that's… what I told you…… Let alone when you take off at that speed……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Regardless, we can always count on a lucky number! 
It provided us a clear goal to put our efforts toward!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But we only ran four laps……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's move on to the next training destination! 
The carrot reading decreed the pool to be our next best choice!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
We'll go down and back in breaststroke thirty-nine times, 
just like our lucky number would have it!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Please get that number out of your heeaaad…!

Would Matikanefukukitaru be able to deliver 
in the Selection Race, now that she has had 
her… "fateful meeting"…?
